Practices through the "Bayes Rules!"
(https://www.bayesrulesbook.com/chapter-2.html)


```{r}
# Load packages
install.packages("bayesrules")
install.packages("janitor")
library(bayesrules)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

# Import article data
data(fake_news)
str(fake_news)
names(fake_news)
##

fake_news %>%
  tabyl(type) %>%
  adorn_totals("row")

fake_news %>%
  tabyl(title_has_excl, type) %>%
  adorn_totals("row")



```
